title: Self-Directed Learning Guide for Elementary Reading Literacy Based on the 4D Model

context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment with flexible scheduling for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners will be able to develop a literacy improvement plan according to the 4D Model (Define-Design-Develop-Disseminate).
Learners will be able to perform smartphone-based reading practice activities at least twice a week to improve reading comprehension accuracy by 30%.
Learners will be able to evaluate their reading comprehension and propose improvement strategies using a peer feedback system.

resources: Self-Assessment Tools with Voice Recording Functionality
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
